scripts.dev: concurrently -p "[{name}]" -n "b,f,a" -c "bgGray.bold,bgCyan.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm --prefix apps/backend run dev" "npm --prefix apps/frontend run dev" "npm --prefix packages/api-client run dev"
